name: Blocky Bee
storyline:
Where have all the bees gone?

Help Blocky Bee find his friends and defeat the Flocky Birds!

The Flocky Birds have chased off Blocky's friends and turned his golden flowers into fire and ice. Can you think fast enough to help Blocky escape?

Send Blocky Bee through a series of hot and cold flowers to escape the Flocky Birds. Don't let Blocky get too hot or cold or he will die!

Lead the pursuing Flocky Birds through the matching color flowers to defeat them and help Blocky Bee survive.
summary:
Blocky Bee is a FREE 2D endless flier with a unique puzzle element included which sets it apart from other games.

As the player tries to get through as many hot and cold obstacles as possible without getting too hot or cold, they also have to defeat the flocky birds chasing them by leading the birds through the matching colour obstacles left behind.

The one handed tapping function makes the game very simple to play, while also being difficult to master.

Possibly the world's HARDEST 2D flyer?
Help Blocky Bee find his friends and defeat the Flocky Birds!

NEW endless flier with a twist! As DIFFICULT as it is ADDICTIVE.

The Flocky Birds have chased off Blocky's friends and turned his golden flowers into fire and ice. Can you think fast enough to help Blocky escape?

Send Blocky Bee through a series of hot and cold flowers to escape the Flocky Birds.

Don't let Blocky get too hot or cold!

Be careful which flowers you fly through as Blocky will die if he gets too hot or too cold.

Lead the pursuing birds through the matching color flowers to defeat them.
